question: Who is appointed as the Chief Secretary of Telangana recently?
explanation: Shailendra Kumar Joshi was named the Chief Secretary of Telangana. Decision regarding Shailendra Kumar Joshi's appointment was taken by Telangana Chief Minister K.Chandrashekhar Rao. Shailendra Kumar Joshi is at present the Special Chief Secretary, Irrigation. He replaces S.P. Singh as Telangana Chief Secretary.
